msbt.message: Turkey Day! Turkey Day! Yay! Today is Turkey Day!Today is when everyone gets to eat super-good food, which means it's the bestest day of the year!
I was hungry and I came out here for the feast, but I guess it's not ready yet, . Come oooon!

Today is Food Day—I mean Turkey Day, so there's a bunch of folks cooking up tasty things at home.I kinda wanna cook too, but Gramma always said you shouldn't do stuff on an empty stomach, so I'm here.
Franklin said he can't find all the ingredients he needs for the feast! We gotta help him! We just gotta!If he can't cook then I can't eat, and I don't want that, !

Food emergency! Franklin needs fancy ingredients for the feast, but I don't know who'd have 'em I got it! You go ask the folks cooking at home for help, and I'll stay here in case Franklin has a breakthrough!
The food looks so good, it's got my mouth wateringbut what I really want is for my mouth to be EATING!
Wow! That food smells so good, I can practically taste it I can't wait to ACTUALLY taste it, !
All that food on the table I've never wanted to be a table so much in my whole entire life,
Wowee! Check out all the stuff Franklin made. Where should I start? I gotta think real hard, .
I can't stop staring at the feast food. I mean, it's just sitting there on that table, being food at me. It's intense.
Sooo tasty! Turkey Day is the best day. On my next birthday, I'm gonna wish for every day be Turkey Day.
My tummy was angry when I told it to save room for today, but now that the feast is on, we're friends again!
So much food! I wanna go back for seconds and second-seconds and What comes after second-seconds?
Every one of these dishes is the best, but if i had to pick, I'd say Another plate of each, please!
I haven't been this happy looking at food since, uhsincesince dinner last night, !
Franklin is such a genius. I've never wanted a job before, but Maybe he needs a food taster, .
I'd never had with before. Wasn't yours?You're like a food-hero! With a cape and a secret identity and everything!
Hey, didn't you bring Franklin that got used in ?You saved ! You're amazing!
I'd never had with manila clams before. Weren't the manila clams yours?You're like a food-hero! With a cape and a secret identity and everything!
Hey, didn't you bring Franklin the manila clams that got used in ?You saved ! You're amazing!
My Turkey Day feast is gonna be way better than my usual feast 'cause it's for Turkey Day!There's gonna be all kinds of good stuff in it too. It's gonna make my tummy sooo happy, !
I dunno if you knew this about me, but I've been eating food for my whole life, . It's true!That's why I'm gonna cook up lots and lots of delicious Turkey Day stuff. For eating!

What most chefs don't get is that if you don't tell your food it's good, it won't BE good. You gotta be like "Don't worry, food. I'm gonna work real hard to make you into the best you, ." See? Like that!
I taste tested too hard and now my food's all gone. So now I'm making it again, .

Anyway! I heard a rumor this recipe's extra, extra good if you throw in a few crumbles.I wanna try it but, uh Well, my last just leftAre you busy? Could you please, please, PLEASE go get me ?If you do that for me, I'll give you Oh! I'll trade you something tasty you can use in your own cooking!

Anyway! My gramma used to say the secret to this recipe was putting in a smidgen of .But I'm all outta smidgens and<10_4 /> And why do I smell ?Hang on, it's you! You've got , don't you?Yay! Hey, could I give you some of my super-tasty ingredients for ?
Sure!
Sorry, no.
Oh Well, we can still be friends. And if you change your mind or you find more, I'll still trade ya!
Hmm I just don't think this'll make my tummy happy until I get , .
I have something for you!
Sorry. I can't help you.
This is boring. I'm stuck at the part where I'm supposed to put in , .
I have something for you!
Sorry. I can't help you.
It's OK. But if you happen to find any I can have, I'll still trade ya!
It's fine. Everyone's cooking right now so stuff's real hard to find.
Huh? Didn't you have something for me? Was it suspense? 'Cause that was real suspenseful!
Whoaso coooool!No! I gotta focus on my recipe. And right now my recipe needs and that's that.
Hooray! Now my food'll get to be its yum-yum-yummiest self. Here, take my extra .
Thank you! Thank you! You're so great, !Hey, do you like secrets? 'Cause I got secret food-smarts! Do you wanna hear one? Here goes
OK, so you know clam chowder, right? That's the chowder with clams andstuff in it, .Well, I happen to know that if some of the stuff in there are scallops, it tastes AMAZING! You gotta try it!
So, the top-secret ingredient chefs put in the bestest clam chowder is get thisclams! Yep, !OK, but the REAL good chefs all like to dump a few bigger shellfish in there to make it even bestester!
So, the best part of pumpkin pie is the pumpkins. That's just a fact. But which color pumpkin is the best?Well, I have it on good authority that the best color isall four colors of pumpkin at once, !
OK, so you know how every color is like a yummy flavor? I hear that really matters with pumpkin pie.And more flavors is gonna mean more better, right? So So you should use, umlots of colors!

OK, so you know how you can do all kinds of stuff to a gratin to make it taste different, ?Well, one of the stuffs is Dungeness crab. You should try that. Then I'll get to eat that. And that'll be great!
OK, I'm pretty sure there isn't a bad way to make gratin. It's super yummy no matter what, .But! Have you ever tried gratin with a buncha hard-shell crab in there? Ooo! That makes it a lot yummier!
OK, have you ever had fish manure? UhI mean fishmeny'air. I did it! So, fish meunière. Ever had it?Because it's really good! And it's really, REALLY good if it kinda smells like a barred knifejaw, !

OK, so everyone who knows how to pronounce fish, uhfish meunière knows it's got lots of big-fish smells!But there's a sorta-rare stripy fish that's got the biggest fish smells of all. Try using one of those!
I cooked super hard, and my food came out super awesome. Thanks a lot for sharing your stuff with me!
Thanks for getting me the stuff to make my food mega good. You're the best, !
Something smells amaaazing! And I know it's not me 'cause I didn't shower today, .I bet the plaza's gonna smell like Turkey Day feast food for weeks!

Once I start cooking, I get really into it. And then I get really INTO it. And then I don't have food anymore.But at least that means I don't have to walk around with pockets fulla cold leftovers. So it's not all bad!
You wouldn't believe how much food I cooked today. 'Cause I sure don't believe it and I was there!But the stains on my shirt don't lie. What a Turkey Day, !
Cooking for Turkey Day is already the best thing ever. But the best part of the best thing ever? The taste tests!
You here to check out the Turkey Day celebration in the plaza? Just follow the smells. You can't miss it!
Turkey Day is the tastiest day. That's why I'm making yummies at home. A whole lot of us are, !
Meeting up in the plaza for Turkey Day was so much fun, !Plus, enough of us spent the day cooking at home that we got all of to smell amazing!
I tried cooking a buncha new stuff today. I had lots of mess-ups, but those were tasty too, !
Today, my tummy got good food and hung out with lots of neighbor tummies. What a great Turkey Day!
The best days are the days when I can eat with my pals. That's what I love most about Turkey Day.But getting to taste test all the food I made for the big feast is a REALLY close second, .
Did you try any of the special Turkey Day food Franklin made? It was spectacular. Just Wow.
OK, the food Franklin makes is great and allbut I don't understand how anyone gets THAT good at food.I mean, I've been eating all my life, and my food's not even close! How is he THAT good, ?
We all had sooo much fun hanging out at the Turkey Day feast!My favorite part was when I had shoot out of my nose after told a joke!I can still smell it too I can't wait till next Turkey Day, .
